org.neo4j.helpers

Class UTF8

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.helpers.UTF8

  • public final class UTF8
extends Object
    Utility class for converting strings to and from UTF-8 encoded bytes.
    Author:
    Tobias Ivarsson
